Title: Episode 4
Plot: Meredith fights her visions but the battle takes its toll. She tries to turn to Lee Kaa but the mad old man is fighting against the demolition of his shack. Then Kaitangata twitches again ? is the island angry?
GuestStars: Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Jason Te Mete as Coach, Robert Faith as Foreman, Charles Koroncho as Kaitangata
